_description: MultiSFL: multi-branch SFL with knowledge replay and adaptive sampling.
_note: Shared params (clip_grad, clip_grad_max_norm, use_sfl_transform, use_torchvision_init, use_full_epochs, g_measure_frequency, g_oracle_mode) are in common.json.
_branches: Number of branch servers. Default: same as clients_per_round.
_lr_server: Server-side learning rate (separate from client lr in common.json).
_alpha_master_pull: Weight for pulling branches toward master model. 0.0=no pull, 1.0=full replacement.
_section_scheduler: === Sampling Proportion Scheduler (p_r): controls replay vs. fresh data ratio ===
_p_update: Update strategy: paper (original) | abs_ratio (ratio of absolute FGN) | one_plus_delta (with clipping).
_gamma: Exponential decay weight for ScoreVectorTracker (fresher label dists weighted higher).
_delta_clip: Max clipping value for delta in 'one_plus_delta' mode.
_replay_budget_mode: batch: per-batch budget | local_dataset: full client dataset budget.
_replay_min_total: Minimum total replay samples per branch (0 = no minimum).
_max_assistant_trials: Max trials to collect replay data from assistant clients per branch.
